actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the payment of interest at a rate of 5 percent on excess amounts withheld from individuals' wages.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require the payment of five percent interest on amounts withheld from an individual's wages in excess of income tax liability.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the payment of interest at a rate of 5 percent on excess amounts withheld from individuals' wages.
